title: 81/318/EEC: Commission Decision of 29 April 1981 establishing that the apparatus described as 'Perkin Elmer - atomic absorption spectrophotometer, model 5000' may be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
header:
Commission Decision
of 29 April 1981
establishing that the apparatus described as "Perkin Elmer — atomic absorption spectrophotometer, model 5000" may be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
(81/318/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The apparatus described as "Perkin Elmer — atomic absorption spectrophotometer, model 5000", which is the subject of an application by the Italian Government of 25 October 1981, may be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 29 April 1981.
For the Commission
Karl-Heinz Narjes
Member of the Commission
